Package de.tum.cit.fop.maze

Class CollectibleItem

java.lang.Object
de.tum.cit.fop.maze.CollectibleItem
Direct Known Subclasses:
Item, TrapItem
public abstract class CollectibleItem extends Object
Abstract base class for collectible items in the maze game. This class handles rendering, collection mechanics, and state persistence for items. Items are loaded from a specific layer in the TiledMap, rendered as textures, and can be collected by the player if they are within a specified proximity. Subclasses must implement the onCollected() method to define behavior when an item is collected.

  • Constructor Details

    • CollectibleItem

      protected CollectibleItem(List<com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture> textures, com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMap map, String layerName)
      Constructs a CollectibleItem with the specified textures, map, and layer name.
      Parameters:
      textures - the list of textures representing the collectible items
      map - the TiledMap containing item positions
      layerName - the name of the layer in the TiledMap where item positions are defined

  • Method Details

    • render

      public void render(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch)
      Renders all collectible items at their current positions.
      Parameters:
      batch - the SpriteBatch used for rendering

    • checkAndCollect

      public boolean checkAndCollect(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 playerPosition, float proximity, int index)
      Checks if the player is within range to collect an item at the specified index. If so, removes the item and triggers the onCollected() method.
      Parameters:
      playerPosition - the player's current position
      proximity - the maximum distance for item collection
      index - the index of the item to check
      Returns:
      true if the item was collected, false otherwise

    • checkAndCollectAll

      public int checkAndCollectAll(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 playerPosition, float proximity)
      Checks if the player is within range to collect all nearby items.
      Parameters:
      playerPosition - the player's current position
      proximity - the maximum distance for item collection
      Returns:
      the number of items collected

    • onCollected

      protected abstract void onCollected()
      Abstract method to define behavior when an item is collected. Must be implemented by subclasses.

    • saveState

      public void saveState(com.badlogic.gdx.Preferences preferences, String prefix)
      Saves the current state of collectible items to preferences.
      Parameters:
      preferences - the Preferences instance for saving state
      prefix - a prefix to differentiate this item's data

    • loadState

      public void loadState(com.badlogic.gdx.Preferences preferences, String prefix)
      Loads the state of collectible items from preferences.
      Parameters:
      preferences - the Preferences instance containing saved state
      prefix - a prefix to differentiate this item's data

    • dispose

      public void dispose()
      Disposes of textures used by this collectible item to free memory.
